content.question: For all x in the closed interval [2,5], the function f has a positive first derivative and a negative second derivative. Which of the following could be a table of values for f ?

choices.label: The answer choices are tables of values containing ordered pairs for x and f(x). This table contains the ordered pairs (2,7), (3,9), (4,12), and (5,16).
The answer choices are tables of values containing ordered pairs for x and f(x). This table contains the ordered pairs (2,7), (3,11), (4,14), and (5,16).
The answer choices are tables of values containing ordered pairs for x and f(x). This table contains the ordered pairs (2,16), (3,12), (4,9), and (5,7).
The answer choices are tables of values containing ordered pairs for x and f(x). This table contains the ordered pairs (2,16), (3,14), (4,11), and (5,7).
The answer choices are tables of values containing ordered pairs for x and f(x). This table contains the ordered pairs (2,16), (3,13), (4,10), and (5,7).

content.answer: The answer choices are tables of values containing ordered pairs for x and f(x). This table contains the ordered pairs (2,7), (3,11), (4,14), and (5,16).

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
